description:
Python is fun. But becoming a great software developer can be a long, hard and intimidating process without the right support.

In this talk I want to highlight some of the best resources that I have found for learning to code and then mastering specific topics. The aim is for everyone to walk away with a better understanding of where to start and how to keep going when it comes to planning a career in software development.
title: Petrus v.j Rensburg-From Zero to Ninja (How to master software development with Python)
